name: Cisco | IOS | Unknown | Ignore BPDUGUARD (SYSLOG)
description: %SPANTREE-SP-2-BLOCK_BPDUGUARD: Received BPDU on port GigabitEthernet4/1 with BPDU Guard enabled. Disabling port.

patterns.value_re: %SPANTREE(-SP)?-2-BLOCK_BPDUGUARD: Received BPDU on port \S+ with BPDU Guard enabled. Disabling port.
